com.google.bitcoin.core

Interface Wallet.AutosaveEventListener

  • Enclosing class:
    Wallet

    public static interface Wallet.AutosaveEventListener
    Implementors can handle exceptions thrown during wallet auto-save, and to do pre/post treatment of the wallet.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean caughtException(Throwable t)
      Called on the auto-save thread if an exception is caught whilst saving the wallet.
      void onAfterAutoSave(File newlySavedFile)
      Called on the auto-save thread after the newly created temporary file has been filled with data and renamed.
      void onBeforeAutoSave(File tempFile)
      Called on the auto-save thread when a new temporary file is created but before the wallet data is saved to it.

    • Method Detail

      • caughtException

        boolean caughtException(Throwable t)
        Called on the auto-save thread if an exception is caught whilst saving the wallet.
        Returns:
        if true, terminates the auto-save thread. Otherwise sleeps and then tries again.

      • onBeforeAutoSave

        void onBeforeAutoSave(File tempFile)
        Called on the auto-save thread when a new temporary file is created but before the wallet data is saved to it. If you want to do something here like adjust permissions, go ahead and do so. The wallet is locked whilst this method is run.

      • onAfterAutoSave

        void onAfterAutoSave(File newlySavedFile)
        Called on the auto-save thread after the newly created temporary file has been filled with data and renamed. The wallet is locked whilst this method is run.
